name: Branding of tuberculous cattle
text: All cattle found to be tuberculous either upon physical examination or by means of the tuberculin test shall be branded upon the left cheek with the registered brand "T." [L 1923, c 124, §2; RL 1925, §627; am L Sp 1932 2d, c 39, §2; RL 1935, §223; RL 1945, §1077; RL 1955, §20-18; HRS ]
